direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods process ISBN-10 codes but perform different operations (validation vs. conversion).
Both methods involve validating or processing ISBN codes, though one is for ISBN-10 and the other for ISBN-13.
Both methods handle ISBN-10 codes, with one validating and the other converting.
Both methods involve validating or processing ISBN codes, though one is for ISBN-10 and the other for ISBN-13.
Both methods validate and process ISBN codes, with one potentially converting ISBN-10 to ISBN-13.
The convertToISBN13 method relies on the calculate method from the isbn13Validator to compute the check digit.
The convertToISBN13 method indirectly relies on the isValid method from the isbn10Validator to ensure the input is a valid ISBN-10 before conversion.
